content.html: Just finished topping up our loft insulation, not the most pleasant job but very straightforward to do. At around £275 it's probably the biggest bang for your buck in terms of reducing energy consumption. #diy Photos before, during and after:
content.value:
Just finished topping up our loft insulation, not the most pleasant job but very straightforward to do. 
At around £275 it's probably the biggest bang for your buck in terms of reducing energy consumption.
